item.title: Host Hugo on Nginx
item.description: Hugo is a powerful static website generator. Here introduces deploying a Hugo website with Nginx on server. Hugo Command hugo new site websitename hugo builds your site hugo --buildDrafts/-Dinclude content marked as draft hugo server high performance server hugo server --buildDrafts/-D`include content marked as draft Ref: Hugo builds your site Nginx Installation Ref: Nginx安装与配置 Command cd /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx // ACC PATH ./nginx -t // CHECK STATUS ./nginx // START ./nginx -s reload // RESTART Basics /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.
